text: Juan Roca Brunet (October 27, 1950 â€“ July 9, 2022) was a Cuban basketball player. He won the bronze medal with the men's national team at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. Brunet died in Havana, Cuba at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cuban basketball players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Cuba
title: Juan Roca Brunet
